verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1471>Gentiles;<s%>

Against <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H6549>Pharaohnecho<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> in <S%H3751>Carchemish,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
<S%H6186>Order<s%> you the <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H6793>shield,<s%> and draw <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H631>Harness<s%> the <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and <S%H5927>get<s%> up, you <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> forth with your <S%H3553>helmets;<s%> <S%H4838>furbish<s%> the <S%H7420>spears,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H5630>brigandines.<s%>

<S%H4069>Why<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> them <S%H2844>dismayed<s%> and <S%H5472>turned<s%> away <S%H268>back?<s%> and their <S%H1368>mighty<s%> ones are <S%H3807>beaten<s%> down, and are <S%H5127>fled<s%> apace, and <S%H6437>look<s%> not <S%H3437>back:<s%> for <S%H4032>fear<s%> was <S%H5439>round<s%> about, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Let not the <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> away, <S%H408>nor<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man <S%H4422>escape;<s%> they shall <S%H3782>stumble,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H5927>comes<s%> up as a <S%H2975>flood,<s%> whose <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H1607>moved<s%> as the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%>

<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>rises<s%> up like a <S%H2975>flood,<s%> and his <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H1607>moved<s%> like the <S%H5104>rivers;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5927>go<s%> up, and will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof.

<S%H5927>Come<s%> up, you <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and <S%H1984>rage,<s%> you <S%H7393>chariots;<s%> and let the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth;<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> and the <S%H6316>Libyans,<s%> that <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H4043>shield;<s%> and the <S%H3866>Lydians,<s%> that <S%H8610>handle<s%> and <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow.<s%>

For <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> that he may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> him of his <S%H6862>adversaries:<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour,<s%> and it shall be <S%H7646>satiate<s%> and made <S%H7301>drunk<s%> with their <S%H1818>blood:<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H5927>Go<s%> up into <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6875>balm,<s%> O <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> shall you use <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7499>medicines;<s%> for you shall not be <S%H8585>cured.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of your <S%H7036>shame,<s%> and your <S%H6682>cry<s%> has <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> for the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man has <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> how <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> should <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> you in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H4024>Migdol,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H5297>Noph<s%> and in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes:<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> you, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> fast, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> you; for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about you.
<S%H4069>Why<s%> are your <S%H47>valiant<s%> men <S%H5502>swept<s%> away? they <S%H5975>stood<s%> not, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H1920>drive<s%> them.

He made <S%H7235>many<s%> to <S%H3782>fall,<s%> yes, <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H7453>another:<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to our own <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of our <S%H4138>nativity,<s%> from the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
They did <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is but a <S%H7588>noise;<s%> he has <S%H5674>passed<s%> the time <S%H4150>appointed.<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> as <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> is among the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and as <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so shall he <S%H935>come.<s%>

O you <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6213>furnish<s%> <S%H3627><s%> yourself to go into <S%H1473>captivity:<s%> for <S%H5297>Noph<s%> shall be <S%H8047>waste<s%> and <S%H3341>desolate<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is like a <S%H3304>very<s%> <S%H3304>fair<s%> <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> but <S%H7171>destruction<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> it <S%H935>comes<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> her <S%H7916>hired<s%> men are in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of her like <S%H4770>fatted<s%> <S%H5695>bullocks;<s%> for they <S%H1571>also<s%> are <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H3437>back,<s%> and are <S%H5127>fled<s%> away <S%H3162>together:<s%> they did not <S%H5975>stand,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> on them, and the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> thereof shall <S%H3212>go<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> for they shall <S%H3212>march<s%> with an <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> against her with <S%H7134>axes,<s%> as <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

They shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> down her <S%H3293>forest,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H2713>searched;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H697>grasshoppers,<s%> and are <S%H369>innumerable.<s%> <S%H4557><s%>
The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be <S%H3001>confounded;<s%> she shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>said;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H527>multitude<s%> of <S%H4996>No,<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> with their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and their <S%H4428>kings;<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and all them that <S%H982>trust<s%> in him:

And I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>lives,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it shall be <S%H7931>inhabited,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H3372>fear<s%> not you, O my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and be not <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you from <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7633>captivity;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and be in <S%H8252>rest<s%> and at <S%H7599>ease,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make him <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

<S%H3372>Fear<s%> you not, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for I am with you; for I will <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> you: but I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3615>end<s%> of you, but <S%H3256>correct<s%> you in <S%H4941>measure;<s%> yet will I not leave you <S%H5352>wholly<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
